metadata.title: CVE-2019-17342 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service or gain privileges by leveraging a racecondition that arose when XENMEM_exchange was introduced.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxenevtchn1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxenforeignmemory1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxengnttab1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxenhypfs1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxenmisc4.17 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxenstore4 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxentoolcore1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
libxentoollog1 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.17-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.17-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-4.17-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-hypervisor-common - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-system-amd64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-system-arm64 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-system-armhf - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-utils-4.17 - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xen-utils-common - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
xenstore-utils - 4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.1+92-g6c33308a8d-1').
